TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit RegexStringValidatorAttribute extends System.Configuration.ConfigurationValidatorAttribute
Public NotInheritable Class RegexStringValidatorAttribute Inherits ConfigurationValidatorAttribute

summary.span: 以声明方式指示 .NET Framework 使用正则表达式在配置属性中执行字符串验证。

span.span: Declaratively instructs the .NET Framework to perform string validation on a configuration property using a regular expression.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你使用修饰配置属性，将指示要验证属性使用的.NET Framework并将装饰参数的值传递给它。You use the to decorate a configuration property, which will instruct the .NET Framework to validate the property using the and pass to it the value of the decorating parameters. 你可以应用只能对属性类型的对象。You may apply objects to property types only. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何修饰的自定义属性对象使用对象。The following example shows how to decorate the properties of a custom object using the object. [!code-csharp[System.Configuration.ConfigurationValidatorAttributes#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationValidatorAttributes/CS/ConfigurationValidatorAttributes.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Configuration.ConfigurationValidatorAttributes#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationValidatorAttributes/VB/ConfigurationValidatorAttributes.vb#4)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string regex) cil managed

param.name: regex
param.span: 用于正则表达式验证的字符串。

span.span: The string to use for regular expression validation.

summary.span: 初始化 对象的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `regex`参数包含该字符串必须匹配的正则表达式模式可以将它分配给修饰的配置元素属性之前。The `regex` parameter contains the regular expression pattern that a string must match before it can be assigned to the decorated configuration-element property. 特性化模型中使用此构造函数，以确保分配给相关属性的字符串值包含仅允许使用的字符。You use this constructor in the attributed model to ensure that the string value assigned to the related property contains only the allowed characters. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 构造函数。The following example shows how to use the constructor. [!code-csharp[System.Configuration.ConfigurationValidatorAttributes#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationValidatorAttributes/CS/ConfigurationValidatorAttributes.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Configuration.ConfigurationValidatorAttributes#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationValidatorAttributes/VB/ConfigurationValidatorAttributes.vb#4)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Regex As String
public: property System::String ^ Regex { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取用于执行正则表达式验证的字符串。

span.span: Gets the string used to perform regular-expression validation.

value.span: 包含正则表达式的字符串，其中的正则表达式用于筛选分配给经过修饰的配置元素属性的字符串。

span.span: The string containing the regular expression used to filter the string assigned to the decorated configuration-element property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你使用属性来执行字符串验证通过调用其方法。You use the property to perform string validation by calling its method. ## Examples 下面的示例显示如何使用 方法。The following example shows how to use the method.
